title: thread '<unnamed>' panicked at 'Forcing query with already existing DepNode on latest nightly

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: E-needs-mcve
labels.description: Call for participation: This issue needs a Minimal Complete and Verifiable Example

body:
This looks like this error has happened [before](https://github.com/rust-lang/rls/issues/999), but with RLS instead of rustc. It wasn't fixed. ### Code https://github.com/shuttle-hq/synth/pull/391 ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.67.0-nightly (c1a859b25 2022-11-10) binary: rustc commit-hash: c1a859b25a95999ba276075bbd8e284ea675b41a commit-date: 2022-11-10 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.67.0-nightly LLVM version: 15.0.4 ``` ### Error output ``` thread '' panicked at 'forcing query with already existing `DepNode` - query-key: Canonical { max_universe: U0, variables: [], value: ParamEnvAnd { param_env: ParamEnv { caller_bounds: [], reveal: UserFacing, constness: NotConst }, value: Binder(TraitPredicate( {std::future::ResumeTy, &'a mut sqlx::PgConnection, std::string::String, &'b std::string::String, str, &'c str, std::pin::Pin> + std::marker::Send + 'd)>>, std::pin::Pin> + std::marker::Send + 'e)>>, ()} as std::marker::Send>, polarity:Positive), []) } } -
